title: A co-worker's rudeness can affect your sleep -- and your partner's

title_detail.value: A co-worker's rudeness can affect your sleep -- and your partner's

summary: A new study found workplace incivilities has the potential to not only negatively affect an employee's sleep but their partner's as well.

summary_detail.value: A new study found workplace incivilities has the potential to not only negatively affect an employee's sleep but their partner's as well.
